com.sessionm.api
Interface ActivityListener

public interface ActivityListener

Implement this interface to receive notifications about SessionM activities.

Method Summary
 void onCancelled(SessionM instance)
          listener method that is called when a SessionM activity will not show
 void onDismissed(SessionM instance)
          listener method that is called when a SessionM activity is dismissed by the user
 void onFinishLoading(SessionM instance)
          listener method that is called when a SessionM activity is finished loading its content
 void onPresented(SessionM instance)
          listener method that is called when a SessionM activity is displayed
 void onStartLoading(SessionM instance)
          listener method that is called when a SessionM activity begins loading content for display
 void onUserInfoChanged(SessionM instance, JSONObject playerinfo)
          listener method that is called when the user changes a preference on the portal; a hashmap of the properties that were modified is passed in
